name:
Step 3: Chart Vessel Course: +10 Perception Test (or -60 Navigation (Warp) Test if Astronomicon not located) to detect warp disturbances en route. Pass/Fail kept secret by GM.
If Navigator has located the Astronomicon, makes +10 Perception Test to detect any warp disturbances along the route. If Astronomicon not located make -60 Navigation (Warp) Test. Pass/Fail amounts are kept secret by the GM. Failiure would mean the Navigator is unaware of any oncoming danger.

system.adept: Pass/Fail of this step becomes relevent in Step 4.5
